data.description: The specified coin was not found or is not activated yet
No client has an open connection using this client_id
The requested events are already being sent to the client_id
The config object is not used in non-EVM coins or other configuration errors
Ticker of the coin to activate streaming for. The coin must be activated first.
In the case of a single client, this defaults to `0`. This ID can be used to access data via [http://localhost:7783/event-stream?id=1](http://localhost:7783/event-stream?id=1)
EVM only. A standard [StreamingConfig](/komodo-defi-framework/api/common_structures/#streaming-config) object.
An identifier for the data stream. This can be used later to disable streaming for the event with [stream::disable](/komodo-defi-framework/api/v20/streaming/disable/).
The specified streamer_id was not found
No client has an open connection using this client_id
This ID can be used to access data (e.g. via [http://localhost:7783/event-stream?id=1](http://localhost:7783/event-stream?id=1))
An identifier for the data stream to disable.
Success message confirming the stream was disabled
The specified coin was not found or is not activated yet
